page.title: 10LOCAL SURVEY
page.content:
We sent out a questionnaire and these are some of the answers.
{DO YOU OWN YOUR HOUSE?}Yes:31 No:6. {HOW OFTEN DO YOU SHOP FOR FOOD? Once a week:23 Twice a week:14 Three times a week:2 Once a month:1 {WHERE DO YOU SHOP? Haywards Heath:19 Horsham:6 Crawley:7 Burgess Hill:6 Local Village Stores:10 {WHAT FUEL DO YOU COOK WITH? Electricity:31 Gas:2 Others {DO YOU USE THE LOCAL BUS SERVICE? Yes:8 No:34 {DO YOU TAKE PART IN ANY SPORTS?}Yes:22 No:19 Tennis is the most popular sport {DO YOU HAVE CENTRAL HEATING?}Yes:31 No:6 {WHAT FUEL DO YOU USE?}Gas:3 Oil:19 Solid Fuel:9 Electricity:4 {DO YOU HAVE AN OPEN FIRE?}Yes:33 No:16 Continued on the next page.
